mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT '승인' FROM take_examination WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND exam_no = #{exam_no}), '확인불가') FROM dual
mapper.insert: Insert INTO take_examination(EXAM_NO, MEM_ID, SUB_CD, EXAM_DATE, GET_POINT ,IS_PASS, S_TIME, E_TIME, FEE_DATE, IS_PAYMENT ,EXAM_CHASI, REG_DATE) values(#{exam_no},#{mem_id},#{sub_cd},#{exam_date},0 ,0, '00:00:00', '00:00:00','9999-99-99',0 ,1,to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
